mapper.select: SELECT cr.id , notice , cr.type , room_name AS "name" , max(cms.send_date) AS "last_chatting" , last_read_id , join_date FROM chatroom cr INNER JOIN chat_member cm ON cr.id = cm.chatroom_id LEFT JOIN chat_message cms ON cms.chatroom_id = cr.id WHERE cm.employee_id=#{reqId} AND cr.id=#{chatroomId}
SELECT cr.id , cr.notice , cr.type , NVL(cm.room_name, cr.default_name) FROM chatroom cr INNER JOIN chat_member cm ON cr.id = cm.chatroom_id WHERE cm.employee_id=#{id}

SELECT cr.id AS "chatroom_id" , cm.room_name AS "chatroom_name" , e.id AS "employee_id" , concat(c.name, ' ' , e.name) AS "name" , a.url AS "profile_img" , d.name AS "department_name" , cm.last_read_id FROM chatroom cr INNER JOIN chat_member cm ON cr.id = cm.chatroom_id INNER JOIN employee e ON e.id = cm.employee_id INNER JOIN department d ON d.id = e.department_id INNER JOIN code c ON c.id = e.pos_id AND c.type_id='300' LEFT JOIN attach a ON a.parent_id = e.id AND a.tbl_id=1077 WHERE cr.id=#{chatroomId}
SELECT id , cmg.employee_id AS "sender_id" , type , send_date , content FROM chat_message cmg INNER JOIN chat_member cm ON cmg.chatroom_id = cm.chatroom_id AND cmg.employee_id = cm.employee_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_member(chatroom_id, employee_id, room_name) VALUES (#{chatroom.id}, #{id}, #{chatroom.name})
INSERT INTO chat_message(id, chatroom_id, employee_id, type, send_date, content) VALUES (#{id}, #{chatroomId}, #{senderId}, #{type}, #{sendDate}, #{content})
